description:
ChemDCAT-AP is a metadata schema extension for providing chemistry specific metadata for a dataset. It builds upon the domain-agnostic DCAT-AP-PLUS schema.

The metadata schema is developend as LinkML model which allows to generate various artefacts such as JSON-Schema, SHACL shapes, Python-bindings, and documentation.
